title: Team-Based Learning and Project-Based Learning Integration Course for Pragmatics Application Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic linguistic concepts and communication experience in professional settings
context.additional_context: Focuses on applying pragmatic knowledge to real work situations through team-based activities and project execution

learning_goals: Learners can design effective communication strategies for workplace situations by analyzing pragmatic principles
Learners can diagnose pragmatic issues and propose solutions based on real-world cases through team collaboration
Learners can present communication improvement plans applying pragmatic theory through project deliverables
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
